results.title: Cardiac receptors modulate the renal sympathetic response to dynamic exercise in rabbits.
results.text_hl: RSNA, blood pressure, and heart rate were measured in seven New Zealand White @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ during treadmill exercise while cardiac receptors were intact (saline), during @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac neural block@@@ with 2% @CHEMICAL_Procaine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011343 @@@procaine@@@ (2% @CHEMICAL_Pregnenolone_Carbonitrile @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011285 @@@PCN@@@), and during cardiac @<m>DISEASE_Pupil_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011681 @@@efferent receptor@@@ block with @CHEMICAL_N_Methylscopolamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019832 @@@methscopolamine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (M + A).

citations.NLM: O'Hagan KP, Bell LB, Mittelstadt SW, Clifford PS. Cardiac receptors modulate the renal sympathetic response to dynamic exercise in rabbits. J Appl Physiol (1985). 1994 Feb;76(2):507-15. PMID: 8175556
